snippet: Brad Evans, a Seattle Sounders midfielder, was recruited by Coach Jurgen Klinsmann to start at right back against Jamaica.
abstract: Jere Longman On Soccer column observes that Brad Evans, Seattle Sounders midfielder who was recruited by United States national team coach Jurgen Klinsmann to start at right back against Jamaica, scored winning goal in a 2-1 victory over Jamaica in World Cup qualifying match.
lead_paragraph: Brad Evans, a Seattle Sounders midfielder, was recruited by Coach Jurgen Klinsmann to start at right back against Jamaica.

headline.seo: Scorer of Winning Goal in World Cup Qualifier Was Late Choice for U.S.
headline.main: In a Position to Cement a Role for the U.S. Team
headline.print_headline: In a Position To Cement a Role For the U.S. Team

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
